elements.name: question5
elements.title: Discuss in pairs how customer communication is organized in your company. Do you mostly have personal contact? Do you write a lot of emails and make regular phone calls to your customers? What role does contact via social networks play in your company?

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Can you think of specific examples from your day-to-day work where you have succeeded in making direct contact with customers and where you have struggled? Think about one example each for ten minutes and then discuss in small groups what you can learn from each other. Make a note of your findings in keywords.

elements.name: question1
elements.title: What can a company do to win you personally as a loyal customer? What qualifications does it need to have?

elements.name: question2
elements.title: Have you already had negative experiences after which you consciously decided against a company? What was the reason why you would not choose this company's product or service again?
